mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LESSON VALUES(SEQ_LESSONNO.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{lessonTitle}, #{lessonPre}, #{lessonContent}, #{lessonArea}, #{lessonPlan}, #{lessonPrice}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
mapper.update: UPDATE LESSON SET LESSON_TITLE = #{lessonTitle}, LESSON_PRE = #{lessonPre}, LESSON_CONTENT = #{lessonContent}, LESSON_AREA = #{lessonArea}, LESSON_PLAN = #{lessonPlan}, LESSON_PRICE = #{lessonPrice}, LESSON_UPDATE = DEFAULT WHERE LESSON_NO = #{lessonNo}
